```{r}
options(error = function(){    # Beep on error
  beepr::beep(sound = "wilhelm")
  Sys.sleep(2) # 
  }
 )
## and when knitting is complete
.Last <- function() {          # Beep on exiting session
  beepr::beep(sound = "ping")
  Sys.sleep(6) # allow to play for 6 seconds
  }
```
